War Office.SEC K ii T .20. 10. 1917, 7.55 p.m.CP.872.Since the bombing raid on Germany which was carried out in the afternoon of the 17th it has been impossible to carry out further operations owing to either rain or low *clouds near Nancy, and today a dense fog prevails down there. As the pilots get to know the country the objectives raided will gradually get more and more distant.1s
